original_text: Peter and his companions were very sleepy, but when they became fully awake, they saw his glory and the two men standing with him.
korean_text: 베드로와 및 함께 있는 자들이 깊이 졸다가 온전히 깨어나 예수의 영광과 및 함께 선 두 사람을 보더니

sentences.original_text: Peter and his companions were very sleepy
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로와 그의 동료들은 몹시 졸립고 있었지만

sentences.original_text: and two men standing with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 서 있는 두 사람을 보았습니다
